overview: Sham and Joe left their village to work in KL. Joe works as a uber driver and Sham works as a sales executive. One day, the two guys are shocked to find a baby in Joeâ€™s car. They tried to locate the parents but to no avail. When they encounter many good things since the baby came to their lives, they decided to keep the baby for a few more days before handing him over to the police. Are they capable to look after the baby with no experience ? Will the baby be returned to his parents ?
title: Baby Bro
